cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 50 mi (85 km) north of the western tip of Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest over the southeastern Gulf of Mexico, then forecast to turn northwest toward the Texas–Louisiana Gulf Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Texas–Louisiana border (around the Lake Charles / Port Arthur area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge watch from San Luis Pass, TX to Ocean Springs, MS; Hurricane watch from Port Bolivar, TX to west of Morgan City, LA; Tropical-storm watch south of Port Bolivar to San Luis Pass, TX and from Morgan City, LA to the mouth of the Mississippi River
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warning for western and central Cuba, lower Florida Keys and Dry Tortugas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and north-western Gulf of Mexico coasts (Texas-Louisiana focus) and adjacent Cuban and Florida Keys coastlines
